net.jini.loader.pref
Class RequireDlPermProvider

java.lang.Object
  java.rmi.server.RMIClassLoaderSpi
      net.jini.loader.pref.PreferredClassProvider
          net.jini.loader.pref.RequireDlPermProvider
public class RequireDlPermProvider
extends PreferredClassProvider

An RMIClassLoader provider that supports preferred classes and enforces DownloadPermission.

See the RMIClassLoader specification for information about how to install and configure the RMIClassLoader service provider.

RequireDlPermProvider()
          Creates a new RequireDlPermProvider.

Constructor Detail

RequireDlPermProvider

public RequireDlPermProvider()
Creates a new RequireDlPermProvider.

This constructor is used by the RMIClassLoader service provider location mechanism when RequireDlPermProvider is configured as the RMIClassLoader provider class.

This constructor passes true to the superclass constructor that has a boolean parameter.
